question: I have asked same question (ref: 5178) to different muftis ad scholars in our country and according to all of them job in any department of bank and any type of work in bank is haram
answer:
QUESTION
According to them even job of peon and guard is haram. Please clarify or correct me with reasons.
ANSWER


Share:
Kindly refer below our standard reply to similar queries.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.

There are two aspects to working in a bank: a) Source and amount of income,
b) Assisting in sin.

If the major source of income in a bank is Haraam, then it is not
permissible to work there. If that is not the case, the income earned will
be permissible. As regards assisting in sin, there has to be some limitation
as every action leadingto a sin is directly or indirectly related to it. In
principle, if one is not directly involved in an interest bearing
transaction, it is permissible. That is, for example, working in the IT
department of the bank. However, ideally a person should seek an alternative
source of income.
